name: Book of shadows (itch)
description:
Unfortunately, the game has bad English. I apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Book of shadows - the story begins when a dark wizard accidentally finds out about the book of shadows. It is stored deep in the library and is inaccessible to the dark forces. Then the dark magician decides to deceive and trick the player into believing himself and bring the book directly into his hands. It's up to you to decide what happens.

Features:
- Interesting puzzles.
- There are two types of endings.
- Go on an exciting journey that will take you less than 60 minutes.

Controls:

Left click - action.

Esc - returns to the previous location.

If you find an error, let me know.
